TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AvailabilityBaseAttribute extends System.Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Event | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate, AllowMultiple=true)

Docs.summary: Describes the availability of a member or type.

remarks.para: This attribute is used to annotate when a type or member of a type was introduced, deprecated, obsolete or is unavailable. This is done on a per-platform basis (one attribute per platform, which can be either iOS, tvOS, watchOS or macOS).
The information is only accurate for active versions of the operating systems, the information is removed as soon as operating systems are deprecated or no longer supported by Apple.
It is the managed equivalent of Clang's availability __attribute__, which is the underlying mechanism that Apple uses to perform these annotations.

Docs.summary: The architectures the attribute applies to (either only 32-bit, only 64-bit or both 32-bit and 64-bit architectures).
Docs.value: The architectures the attribute applies to (either only 32-bit, only 64-bit or both 32-bit and 64-bit architectures).

Docs.summary: The type of availability information this attribute contains.
Docs.value: The type of availability information this attribute contains.
Docs.remarks: The type of availability information specifies whether the version in the attribute applies to when the API was introduced, deprecated, obsoleted or became unavailable.

Docs.summary: Additional information related to the availability information.
Docs.value: Additional information related to the availability information.
Docs.remarks: This is typically used to recommend other API when something is deprecated or obsoleted.

Docs.summary: The platform this availability attribute applies to.
Docs.value: The platform this availability attribute applies to.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a human readable version of the availability attribute.
Docs.returns: A human readable version of the availability attribute.

Docs.summary: The version when the API was introduced, deprecated, obsoleted or became unavailable.
Docs.value: The version when the API was introduced, deprecated, obsoleted or became unavailable.
